'''"Kyoto"''' is a song composed by [[C418]] that plays in the [[Mash-up pack#Festive Edition|Festive Mash-up pack]] for {{lce}} and {{3ds}}.

== Track description ==
{{C418 agreement}}[[File:Kyoto.wav]]

"Kyoto" is a downtempo song in two main parts. The first part features a piano playing a dark bassline, with a melody and countermelody played by a saxophone and a flute, respectively. At the end of the first part, a triangle plays out the melody before it transitions to the second part, which features synthesized strings and a [[wikipedia:celesta|celesta]].

== Trivia ==
* "Kyoto" refers to {{W|Kyoto|the Japanese city of the same name}}, which was formerly the imperial capital of Japan.
